description: Agile Financial Modeling is the latest addition to INVESTyR's "School of Raising Capital" where we educate entrepreneurs on gaining access to capital. This course focuses on a phrase we like to call "Agile Financial Modeling" which means to use lean principles while creating and updating financial documents. Entrepreneurs have a limited amount of time to get things done and ultimately, done is better than perfect. That's why Agile Financial Modeling is about speed. Financial assumptions are never going to be finished and there's no reason to think that you're building the final Pro Forma, etc. In under 6 weeks, you'll learn how to complete the bare minimum financial statements to get you to the next level. Sign up today to save time and money with this course!
title: School of Raising Capital: Agile Financial Modeling
